row.process:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Dir" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_UNPACK_SOURCE_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Dir" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_UNPACK_TARGET_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive Type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_ARCHIVE_TYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Strict File Extension" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_STRICT_FILE_EXTENSION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Preserve File Attributes" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PRESERVE_FILE_ATTRIBUTES#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Building output file path
! Action name : SET &UC4RB_ACTION_NAME# = "UnpackAction"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_OPTIONS#, string, 12
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[3] = "-sourcedir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_UNPACK_SOURCE_DIR#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[5] = "-targetdir" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_UNPACK_TARGET_DIR#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[7] = "-archivetype" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_ARCHIVE_TYPE#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[9] = "-strict" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_STRICT_FILE_EXTENSION#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[11] = "-preserveattributes" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_PRESERVE_FILE_ATTRIBUTES#" : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_ARTIFACT.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** UNPACK ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** UNPACK ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
